1.0.name: wordpress/pop-menus-for-wp-admin
1.0.description:
Start saving time now. Make use of this lightwieght and simple Pop Menu plugin for the new WP-Admin backend.

Benifits:

  • Saves time.
  • Saves space.
  • Improves usability.
  • Acess to any menus on demand.
  • Unobtrusive code.
  • Created with the jQuery library

Known Bugs:

  • Page must be refreshed if menu is collapsed/folded.
  • IE6 - Menus go under Select Boxes and some hover issues.
  • IE - No fixed menu for Intenet Explorer
  • Still to be tested with Opera
